name: Eldrin Leafcaller
role: High Druid of the Circle of Whispering Winds
motivation: To safeguard the ancient secrets of the Whispering Mountains and maintain the balance between nature and civilization.

name: Sylara Moonshadow
motivation: To protect the magical creatures of Elkwood Forest and preserve the healing nature of the River of Tranquility.

name: Thorne Greenfield
motivation: To defend the Emerald Plains from external threats and ensure the prosperity of Svenlia using the power of nature.

name: Ayla Runeheart
motivation: To uncover the mysteries inscribed on the ancient runestones and harness their power for the preservation of Svenlia.

name: Galen Stoneseer
role: Guardian of the Stone Circle of Elders
motivation: To protect the Stone Circle and ensure the magical knowledge it holds is used wisely and responsibly.
